LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.0.label: Feeling great
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.0.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel great right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.1.label: Feeling good
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.1.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel good right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.2.label: Feeling bad
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.2.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel bad right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.3.label: Feeling terrible
LanguageData.FeelingRandom.stages.3.description: For no apparent reason, I just feel terrible right now.
LanguageData.Imprisoned.stages.0.label: imprisoned
LanguageData.SharedBed.stages.0.label: sharing bed
LanguageData.SharedBed.stages.0.description: I have to share a bed with someone who I don't particularly want to.
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.stages.0.label: colonist left unburied
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.stages.0.descriptio: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. People deserve a decent burial.
LanguageData.Naked.stages.0.label: naked
LanguageData.Pain.stages.0.label: in a little pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.1.label: in a moderate amount of pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.2.label: experiencing acute pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.2.description: Make it stop... make it stop... make it stop...
LanguageData.Pain.stages.3.label: in shock from exceptional pain
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorSoothe.stages.0.label: psychic emanator soothe
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorSoothe.stages.0.descripti: The psychic emanator makes me feel strange, but also very relaxed.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.0.label: psychic soothe (medium)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.0.description: It's like a calming voice at the back of my mind, soothing me, settling my nerves.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.1.label: psychic drone (low)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.1.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.2.label: psychic drone (medium)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.2.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.3.label: psychic drone (high)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.3.description: The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.4.label: psychic drone (extreme)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.4.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
LanguageData.Joywire.stages.0.label: joywire
LanguageData.Aurora.stages.0.label: beautiful aurora
